channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-28282] Merging into iceberg table fails with copy on write when values clause has a function call
item.description:
create external table target_ice(a int, b string, c int) stored by iceberg tblproperties ('format-version'='2', 'write.merge.mode'='copy-on-write');
create table source(a int, b string, c int);

explain
merge into target_ice as t using source src ON t.a = src.a
when matched and t.a > 100 THEN DELETE
when not matched then insert (a, b) values (src.a, concat(src.b, '-merge new 2'));

 org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.parse.SemanticException: Encountered parse error while parsing rewritten merge/update or delete query

item.summary: Merging into iceberg table fails with copy on write when values clause has a function call

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Merged to master. Thanks dkuzmenko for the review!
